analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Abyākato sanidassano dhammo naabyākatassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: abyākataḥ sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ na abyākatassa na sa nidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Abyākato sanidassano dhammo nakusalassa nasanidassanassa …pe…. (Cha pañhā
analyzed: paccayaḥ abyākataḥ sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa na sa nidassanassa pe cha pañhā

original: kātabbā.) Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte cha, atthiyā avigate cha.
analyzed: kātabbā ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā tīṇi upanissaye purejāte cha atthiyā avigate cha

original: Kusalaṁ anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalena tīṇiyeva. Abyākatena tīṇiyeva. Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kusalam anidassanam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalena tīṇi eva abyākatena tīṇi eva hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
